Package io.github.kushnirvladyslav

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BaseEventHandler<T extends Event<?>>
    Base functional interface for event handlers in the event system.
    EventErrorHandler
    Functional interface for handling errors that occur during event processing.
    ListEventsHandler<T extends Event<?>>
    Functional interface for handling lists of events.
    SingleEventHandler<T extends Event<?>>
    Functional interface for handling individual events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ControlledListFuture
    Manages and controls a list of futures with shared scheduler.
    Event<T>
    Abstract base class for all events in the event management system.
    EventManager
    Central event management system that implements the Singleton pattern.
    EventPublisher
    Abstract base class for components that publish events to the event management system.
    EventSubscriber
    Abstract base class for components that subscribe to and process events from the event management system.
    ExecuteEventPublisher
    Abstract base class for event publishers that use ExecutorService.
    ProcessingListEventErrorSubscriber
    Abstract base class for subscribers that process lists of events with error handling capabilities.
    ProcessingListEventSubscriber
    Abstract base class for subscribers that process lists of events using type-specific handlers.
    ProcessingSingleEventErrorSubscriber
    Abstract base class for subscribers that process events with error handling capabilities.
    ProcessingSingleEventSubscriber
    Abstract base class for subscribers that process individual events using type-specific handlers.
    ScheduleEventPublisher
    Abstract base class for event publishers that use ScheduledExecutorService.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EventPriority
    Enumeration of event priority levels used for event processing order.
    Status
    Enumeration representing the possible states of event system components.
